question1.title: Our MTM team (all those involved with MTM) has a clearly defined vision and mission.
question1.commentTitle: Please type your MTM vision/mission statement into the box below.

question2.title: We’ve received coaching/training about vision and mission.
question2.commentTitle: Please share from whom you received your vision/mission coaching.

question3.title: Those on our MTM team can articulate the vision and mission.
question3.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question4.title: We’re satisfied that our current vision and mission accurately reflect our present MTM strategy.
question4.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question1.title: We have a prayer strategy.
question1.commentTitle: Please briefly describe your team’s prayer strategy.

question2.title: We’ve received prayer strategy coaching/training.
question2.commentTitle: Please tell us where you received your training.

question3.title: We regularly pray together and/or engage others to pray for our people group/target audience.
question3.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question4.title: We are satisfied with our current prayer strategy and the level of active engagement in it.
question4.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question1.title: We have a marketing plan in place.

question2.title: We have received coaching/training in Marketing.
question2.commentTitle: Please tell us about the training you received.

question3.title: We are marketing content to our target audience on at least one digital platform (Facebook, Instagram, etc) on a consistent basis.
question3.commentTitle: How often do you post content and how often are you running ads? How much are you spending per month to market content?

question4.title: We are satisfied with the results we’re receiving from our current marketing efforts.
question4.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question1.title: We have a process for creating, organizing, and planning content.

question2.title: We have received content development & planning coaching/training.
question2.commentTitle: What kinds of training/coaching have you received?

question3.title: We are strategically creating original and/or sourcing existing content to plan campaigns.
question3.commentTitle: Tell us about the original content you are creating/have created. What sources are you using for content? What have you found effective?

question4.title: We’re satisfied with our current content development and planning process.
question4.commentTitle: Do you have content that you would be willing to share with other teams? Do you have a system for sharing content you create?

question1.title: We have at least one Digital Responder/Filterer.
question1.commentTitle: Tell us about your Digital Responder. Is he/she a national? Have they been trained in multiplicative disciple making?

question2.title: Our Digital Responder/Filterer(s) has received coaching/training for and feels competent in his/her role.
question2.commentTitle: In what areas would the Digital Filterer(s) like more training?

question3.title: Our Digital Filterer is regularly engaging in conversations and filtering for spiritual seekers.
question3.commentTitle: What tools (Echo / Disciple.Tools / Messenger / WhatsApp, etc) is your Digital Filterer using?

question4.title: Our current digital filtering process is yielding the desired results.
question4.commentTitle: Are spiritual seekers being assigned to the Dispatcher for follow up? Please tell us more.

question1.title: We have a follow-up management system (i.e. Disciple.Tools) in place for keeping up with contacts/spiritual seekers.
question1.commentTitle: Which tools are you using to follow-up with contacts?

question2.title: Digital Filterers, Dispatchers, and Multipliers have received follow-up data management coaching/training.
question2.commentTitle: Would any of these roles like additional training in utilizing Disciple.Tools (or Echo)?

question3.title: We are regularly assigning, receiving, and providing updates about contacts in the follow-up data management system.
question3.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question4.title: We are satisfied with our process/system for following up with spiritual seekers.
question4.commentDescription: If you would want to add something to your answer feel free to write it here:

question1.title: We are set up with and have access to Global Movement Metrics (GMM).
question1.commentTitle: If so, please provide your unique GMM identifier. If not, would you like to begin the process of getting connected to GMM?

question2.title: We have received coaching/training about digital assets and their role in reporting.
question2.commentTitle: Who provided your training in the area of reporting?

question3.title: We are aware of and consistently completing the MTM quarterly reporting updates.
question3.commentTitle: If not, are you receiving the quarterly reminders to complete the quarterly updates?

question4.title: We are confident in our understanding of Global Movement Metrics and reporting.
question4.commentTitle: Please describe any area where you could use additional training.

question1.title: We have an accurate, active and personalized annual budget for MTM.
question1.commentTitle: Approximately, what is your annual budget?

question2.title: We have received coaching/training around the topic of funding.
question2.commentTitle: What kinds of coaching have you received?

question3.title: We have access to sufficient funding to cover this year’s budgeted MTM costs.
question3.commentTitle: What sources of funding have you accessed? (Private, grants, etc?)

question4.title: Our source of funding is able to sustain our MTM initiative going forward.
question4.commentTitle: When do you anticipate needing additional funding?

question1.title: We are committed to multiplicative disciple making (i.e. DMM, CPM).
question1.commentTitle: Please describe your understanding of and commitment to Multiplicative Disciple Making.

question2.title: We have  received coaching/training in multiplicative disciple making.
question2.commentTitle: What training have you received? In what ways has that training impacted your ministry efforts?

question3.title: We have a plan/process to train new Multipliers and new believers in multiplicative disciple making (i.e. Zúme).

question4.title: We’re confident that our offline disciple making strategy is designed to lead to multiplication.

question2.title: We have received coalition development coaching/training.

question3.title: We’re regularly identifying, referring and mobilizing potential Multipliers and partners.

question4.title: We’re satisfied with the current makeup and growth opportunities for our MTM coalition.

question1.title: We have a plan for expanding our reach to other cities where Multipliers live.

question2.title: We have received coaching/training about how to expand our reach.
question2.commentTitle: Tell us more about the coaching you received.

question3.title: We're actively sharing content and targeting ads to identity seekers in the city(ies) where equipped Multiplers live.
question3.commentTitle: How many cities / regions do you have multipliers in, including your own? How many Multipliers are in your network?

question4.title: We’re satisfied with the fruit we are seeing with our current targeted reach and expansion efforts.

question1.title: We have set up at least two outreach platforms (i.e. Website, Facebook, YouTube).
question1.commentTitle: Share which platforms you are using.

question2.title: We have received coaching/training about various outreach platforms and how to use them.
question2.commentTitle: Which training(s) have been especially helpful?

question3.title: Our platforms are currently up to date, functioning, and being utilized.
question3.commentTitle: What is the next platform you would like training in?

question4.title: We’re satisfied with the results we are getting from our current outreach platforms.
question4.commentTitle: Please share one success story related to a platform you are using. Would you be willing to help train others to use the platform(s) you are using?
